weekly picks (Jan 2 week 2023)

Posted on January 9, 2023 in 2023jan,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Jan 2nd week collection

  1. 2301.04175 The magnetic field driven superconductor-metal transition in disordered hole-overdoped cuprates (arXiv)

  2. 2301.04184 Electronic character of charge order in square planar low valence nickelates (arXiv)

  3. 2301.04329 Coexistence of zigzag antiferromagnetic order and superconductivity in compressed NiPSe3 (Ni-van-der-Waals, arXiv)

  4. 2301.04557 **Mathematical and Physical Properties of Three-Band s+- Eliashberg Theory for Iron Pnictides (pnictide, arXiv)

  5. 2301.04580 Superconductivity in Ce-based cage compounds (Ce, arXiv)

  6. 2301.04239 Magnetic anisotropy and low-energy spin dynamics in magnetic van der Waals compounds Mn${2}$P${2}$S${6}$ and MnNiP${2}$S$_{6}$ (arXiv)

  7. 2301.04310 Thermodynamic Properties of the Mott Insulator-Metal Transition in a Triangular Lattice System Without Magnetic Order (arXiv)

  8. 2301.04490 Correlated topological insulator in organic antiferromagnets (arXiv)

  9. 2301.04495 Evolution of the spin dynamics during freezing in the spin-glass Fe${x}$Cr${1-x}$ (FM-AFM-spin-glass, arXiv)

  10. 2301.04556 Non-Fermi liquid behavior in a simple model of Fermi arcs and pseudogap (arXiv)

  11. 2301.04565 The anatomy of topological Anderson transitions (arXiv)

  12. PhysRevLett.130.026201 Quantum Phase Transition in the One-Dimensional Water Chain (PRL) physics 5 Quantum Phase Transition Predicted for Gaseous Water (Physics)

  13. PhysRevLett.130.026801 Exactly Solvable Model for a Deconfined Quantum Critical Point in 1D (MLevin, PRL)

  14. PhysRevLett.130.026901 Twist-Dependent Intra- and Interlayer Excitons in Moir\‘e ${\mathrm{MoSe}}_{2}$ Homobilayers (PRL)

  15. PhysRevB.107.014506 Reconciling the $\ensuremath{\pi}$ phase shift in Josephson junction experiments with even-parity superconductivity in ${\mathrm{Sr}}{2}{\mathrm{RuO}}{4}$ (Kee, PRB)

  16. PhysRevB.107.024504 Ab initio study of metastable occupation of tetrahedral sites in palladium hydrides and its impact on superconductivity (PRB)

  17. PhysRevB.107.035115 Scaling analysis of anomalous Hall resistivity and magnetoresistance in the quasi-two-dimensional ferromagnet ${\mathrm{Fe}}{3}{\mathrm{GeTe}}{2}$ (PRB)

  18. PhysRevB.107.035117 Reentrant quantum spin Hall effect in the presence of an exchange field (PRB)

  19. PhysRevB.107.035118 Thermodynamic and electron transport properties of ${\mathrm{Ca}}{3}{\mathrm{Ru}}{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{7}$ from first-principles phonon calculations and Boltzmann transport theory (PRB)

  20. PhysRevB.107.045115 Flat optical conductivity in the topological kagome magnet ${\mathrm{TbMn}}{6}{\mathrm{Sn}}{6}$ (kagome, PRB)

  21. PhysRevB.107.045409 Fractional second-order topological insulator from a three-dimensional coupled-wires construction (Jelena, PRB)

  22. PhysRevB.107.L041103 Emergent superconductivity and non-Fermi liquid transport in a doped valence bond solid insulator (DHLee, PRB)

  23. 2301.03603 Josephson effect in altermagnets (arXiv)

  24. 2301.03838 Persistent Josephson tunneling between Bi$2$Sr$_2$CaCu$_2$O${8+x}$ flakes twisted by 45$^\circ$ across the superconducting dome (arXiv)

  25. 2301.03937 Majorana Spin Current Generation by Dynamic Strain (majorana, arXiv)

  26. 2301.03628 Topological order in interacting semimetals (arXiv)

  27. 2301.03642 Topological surface states in the Kondo insulator YbB$_{12}$ revealed via planar tunneling spectroscopy (arXiv)

  28. PhysRevB.107.045114 Nature of visons in the perturbed ferromagnetic and antiferromagnetic Kitaev honeycomb models (PRB)

  29. PhysRevB.107.045112 Dimensional crossover of charge order in ${\mathrm{IrTe}}_{2}$ with strong interlayer coupling (PRB)

  30. PhysRevB.107.045111 Universal topological marker (PRB)

  31. PhysRevB.107.035114 Nonlinear optical responses in nodal line semimetals (YBKim, PRB)

  32. PhysRevB.107.035113 Lindblad master equation approach to the topological phase transition in the disordered Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model (PRB)

  33. PhysRevB.107.014505 Degeneracy between even- and odd-parity superconductivity in the quasi-one-dimensional Hubbard model and implications for ${\mathrm{Sr}}{2}{\mathrm{RuO}}{4}$ (PRB)

  34. PhysRevB.107.014408 Experimental observation of interfacial Rashba-Edelstein magnetoresistance in Cr/YIG heterostructures (PRB)

  35. PhysRevB.107.014407 Generation of modulated magnetic structures based on cluster multipole expansion: Application to $\ensuremath{\alpha}$-Mn and $\mathrm{Co}{M}{3}{\mathrm{S}}{6}$ (PRB)

  36. PhysRevX.13.011003 Floquet Simulators for Topological Surface States in Isolation (KWKim, PRX)

  37. 2301.02892 Disorder-induced finite center-of-mass momentum Cooper pairing and its consequences to the critical temperature and superconducting gap of overdoped cuprates (arXiv.org)

  38. 2301.02929 Leggett’s plasma resonances and two-gap structures in the CVCs of MgB$_2$ break junctions $-$ a direct evidence for a two-gap superconductivity in MgB$_2$ (arXiv.org)

  39. 2301.03240 Superconductivity in an Orbital-reoriented SnAs Square Lattice: a Case Study of Li0.6Sn2As2 and NaSnAs (arXiv.org)

  40. 2301.03357 $d$-wave superconductivity as a model for diborides apart MgB$_2$ (arXiv.org)

  41. 2301.03473 Correlated carrier dynamics in a superconducting van der Waals heterostructure (arXiv.org)

  42. 2301.02677 Resonant inelastic X-ray scattering in topological semimetal FeSi (arXiv.org)

  43. 2301.02696 Band unfolding with a general transformation matrix: from code implementation to interpretation of photoemission spectra (arXiv.org)

  44. 2301.03223 Mean-field approximation of the Hubbard model expressed in a many-body basis (arXiv.org)

  45. 2301.03526 Thermal Hall conductivity of $\alpha$-RuCl$_3$ (Kee, arXiv.org)

  46. PhysRevB.107.014303 Driven one-dimensional noisy Kitaev chain (PRB)

  47. PhysRevB.107.014406 Texture-induced spin-orbit coupling and skyrmion-electron bound states in a N\‘eel antiferromagnet (skyrmion, PRB)

  48. PhysRevB.107.024408 Topological magnons on the triangular kagome lattice (magnon, PRB)

  49. PhysRevB.107.035112 Strong manipulation of the valley splitting upon twisting and gating in ${\mathrm{MoSe}}{2}/{\mathrm{CrI}}{3}$ and ${\mathrm{WSe}}{2}/{\mathrm{CrI}}{3}$ van der Waals heterostructures (PRB)

  50. PhysRevB.107.045408 Targeted Dy intercalation under graphene/SiC for tuning its electronic band structure (PRB)

  51. PhysRevB.107.L041401 Optical classification of excitonic phases in molecular functionalized atomically-thin semiconductors (PRB)

  52. PhysRevB.107.L041402 Broken symmetry and competing orders in Weyl semimetal interfaces (PRB)

  53. 2301.02248 Optical Control of Slow Topological Electrons in Moire Systems (arXiv)

  54. 2301.02274 Spin-charge separation and unconventional superconductivity in t-J model on honeycomb lattice (hoenycomb, arXiv)

  55. 2301.02460 Half-metal and other fractional metal phases in doped AB bilayer graphene (Nori, arXiv)

  56. PhysRevB.107.024406 Doping control of magnetism and emergent electromagnetic induction in high-temperature helimagnets (YMn6Sn6, PRB)
